name: Exploring Borders - Tourist Runner
description:
Dodge, jump and type your way through the world! Enjoy a tasty baguette while in France, duck under flying beer steins in Germany or take a photo of the Statue of Liberty while in America in this international game of just enjoying being a tourist.

Immerse yourself in different cultures, and don't get hit by the cheese!

The game is fully playable in English and German.


How to Play

Press 'Shift' to duck under high-flying objects.

Press 'Space' to jump over low-flying objects.

Type the words you see on top of the screen as fast as possible when you bring out the map!

Type as fast you can to get into the global Highscore list!




This game has been created in 48 hours during the #PlayJam20 by Sarah, Marie, Inka and Björn, with music from Deniz.
